    • Method Detail

      • findAnnotations

        public static List<ValidationGroups> findAnnotations(Method method)
        Search for ValidationGroups annotations on class and method. Checks direct annotations and annotations annotating method/class annotations (inside annotations).
        Parameters:
        method - method to analyze
        Returns:
        list of found annotations (class annotations first) or empty list
